sentence.text: No drug interaction studies have been conducted for COLAZAL, however the use of orally administered antibiotics could, theoretically, interfere with the release of mesalamine in the colon.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> drug interaction studies have been conducted for COLAZAL, </scope> however the use of orally administered antibiotics could, theoretically, interfere with the release of mesalamine in the colon.
